Postal code |postal_code =11040 |area_code =+381 11 |blank_name =Car plates |blank_info =BG |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = www.vozdovac.rs |footnotes = }} Voždovac is one of 17 municipalities that make up the City of Belgrade, the capital of Serbia. The neighborhood of Voždovac is 4–5 km south of downtown Belgrade. The name Voždovac come from the word vožd which means leader. Due to its shape, it borders more municipalities than any other: Vračar on the north, Zvezdara on the north-east, Grocka on the east, Sopot on the south, Barajevo on the south-west, Čukarica and Rakovica on the west and Savski Venac on the north-west. == International cooperation == Voždovac is twinned with the following cities and municipalities: Stalna konferencija gradova i opština. Retrieved on 2007-06-18. * Florence, Italy * Šempeter, Slovenia And has signed friendship charters with following cities and municipalities: * Drežnica, Slovenia * Milići, Bosnia and Herzegovina * Nea Penteli, Greece * Ogulin, Croatia * Pula, Croatia ==References== Category:Settlements in Serbia Category:Belgrade
